001package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.bungee;
002
003import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common.FileUtils;
004import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common.Yaml;
005import net.md_5.bungee.config.Configuration;
006import net.md_5.bungee.config.ConfigurationProvider;
007import net.md_5.bungee.config.YamlConfiguration;
008import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
009import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
010
011import java.io.IOException;
012import java.nio.file.Path;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.Collection;
015import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Objects;
018
019/**
020 * This class implements {@link Yaml} on BungeeCord.
021 * <p>
022 * Using null for @NotNull argument will cause a {@link NullPointerException}.
023 */
024public class BungeeYaml implements Yaml {
025
026    protected final Path filePath;
027    protected Configuration config;
028
029    /**
030     * Creates an {@link BungeeYaml} with no default values.
031     * <p>
032     * This constructor loads the file automatically.
033     *
034     * @param filePath File path to load or save.
035     */
036    public BungeeYaml(@NotNull Path filePath) {
037        this(filePath, true);
038        config = null;
039    }
040
041    /**
042     * Creates an {@link BungeeYaml} with no default values.
043     *
044     * @param filePath File path to load or save.
045     * @param autoLoad True if automatically load, false otherwise.
046     */
047    public BungeeYaml(@NotNull Path filePath, boolean autoLoad) {
048        Objects.requireNonNull(filePath, "filePath must not be null.");
049
050        this.filePath = filePath;
051        if (autoLoad) load();
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * Loads a yaml file.
056     * <p>
057     * If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one.
058     *
059     * @return True if the load is successful or false if it is failure.
060     */
061    @Override
062    public boolean load() {
063        if (FileUtils.checkFile(filePath)) {
064            try {
065                config = ConfigurationProvider.getProvider(YamlConfiguration.class).load(filePath.toFile());
066                return true;
067            } catch (IOException e) {
068                e.printStackTrace();
069            }
070        }
071        return false;
072
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Checks if the file is loaded.
077     *
078     * @return True if the file is loaded or false if it is not loaded.
079     */
080    @Override
081    public boolean isLoaded() {
082        return config != null;
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Save to yaml file.
087     * <p>
088     * If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one.
089     *
090     * @return True if the save is successful or false if it is failure.
091     */
092    @Override
093    public boolean save() {
094        try {
095            if (FileUtils.checkFile(filePath)) {
096                ConfigurationProvider.getProvider(YamlConfiguration.class).save(getConfig(), filePath.toFile());
097                return true;
098            }
099        } catch (IOException e) {
100            e.printStackTrace();
101        }
102        return false;
103    }
104
105    /**
106     * Get the path to a yaml file.
107     *
108     * @return The path to a yaml file.
109     */
110    @Override
111    @NotNull
112    public Path getPath() {
113        return filePath;
114    }
115
116    /**
117     * Gets {@link Configuration}.
118     *
119     * @return {@link Configuration}
120     * @throws IllegalStateException Throws when a yaml file is not loaded.
121     */
122    @NotNull
123    public Configuration getConfig() throws IllegalStateException {
124        if (isLoaded()) {
125            return config;
126        } else {
127            throw new IllegalStateException("A yaml file is not loaded.");
128        }
129    }
130
131    /**
132     * Gets the requested boolean by path.
133     * <p>
134     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns {@code false}.
135     *
136     * @param path Path of the boolean to get.
137     * @return Requested boolean.
138     */
139    @Override
140    public boolean getBoolean(@NotNull String path) {
141        return getBoolean(path, false);
142    }
143
144    /**
145     * Gets the requested boolean by path.
146     *
147     * @param path Path of the boolean to get.
148     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
149     * @return Requested boolean.
150     */
151    @Override
152    public boolean getBoolean(@NotNull String path, boolean def) {
153        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
154        return isLoaded() ? config.getBoolean(path, def) : def;
155    }
156
157    /**
158     * Gets the requested double by path.
159     * <p>
160     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
161     *
162     * @param path Path of the double to get.
163     * @return Requested double.
164     */
165    @Override
166    public double getDouble(@NotNull String path) {
167        return getDouble(path, 0);
168    }
169
170    /**
171     * Gets the requested double by path.
172     *
173     * @param path Path of the double to get.
174     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
175     * @return Requested double.
176     */
177    @Override
178    public double getDouble(@NotNull String path, double def) {
179        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
180        return isLoaded() ? config.getDouble(path, def) : def;
181    }
182
183    /**
184     * Gets the requested integer by path.
185     * <p>
186     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
187     *
188     * @param path Path of the integer to get.
189     * @return Requested integer.
190     */
191    @Override
192    public int getInt(@NotNull String path) {
193        return getInt(path, 0);
194    }
195
196    /**
197     * Gets the requested integer by path.
198     *
199     * @param path Path of the integer to get.
200     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
201     * @return Requested integer.
202     */
203    @Override
204    public int getInt(@NotNull String path, int def) {
205        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
206        return isLoaded() ? config.getInt(path, def) : def;
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * Gets the requested long by path.
211     * <p>
212     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
213     *
214     * @param path Path of the long to get.
215     * @return Requested long.
216     */
217    @Override
218    public long getLong(@NotNull String path) {
219        return getLong(path, 0);
220    }
221
222    /**
223     * Gets the requested long by path.
224     *
225     * @param path Path of the long to get.
226     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
227     * @return Requested long.
228     */
229    @Override
230    public long getLong(@NotNull String path, long def) {
231        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
232        return isLoaded() ? config.getLong(path, def) : def;
233    }
234
235    /**
236     * Gets the requested string by path.
237     * <p>
238     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty string.
239     *
240     * @param path Path of the string to get.
241     * @return Requested string.
242     */
243    @Override
244    @NotNull
245    public String getString(@NotNull String path) {
246        return getString(path, "");
247    }
248
249    /**
250     * Gets the requested string by path.
251     *
252     * @param path Path of the string to get.
253     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
254     * @return Requested string.
255     */
256    @Override
257    @NotNull
258    public String getString(@NotNull String path, @NotNull String def) {
259        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
260        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
261
262        String value = isLoaded() ? config.getString(path, def) : null;
263        return value != null ? value : def;
264    }
265
266    /**
267     * Gets the requested string list by path.
268     * <p>
269     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty string list.
270     *
271     * @param path Path of the string list to get.
272     * @return Requested string list.
273     */
274    @Override
275    @NotNull
276    public List<String> getStringList(@NotNull String path) {
277        return getStringList(path, new ArrayList<>());
278    }
279
280    /**
281     * Gets the requested string list by path.
282     *
283     * @param path Path of the string list to get.
284     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
285     * @return Requested string list.
286     */
287    @Override
288    @NotNull
289    public List<String> getStringList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<String> def) {
290        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
291        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
292        return isLoaded() ? config.getStringList(path) : def;
293    }
294
295    /**
296     * Gets the requested short list by path.
297     * <p>
298     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty short list.
299     *
300     * @param path Path of the short list to get.
301     * @return Requested short list.
302     */
303    @Override
304    @NotNull
305    public List<Short> getShortList(@NotNull String path) {
306        return getShortList(path, new ArrayList<>());
307    }
308
309    /**
310     * Gets the requested short list by path.
311     *
312     * @param path Path of the short list to get.
313     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
314     * @return Requested short list.
315     */
316    @Override
317    @NotNull
318    public List<Short> getShortList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Short> def) {
319        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
320        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
321        return isLoaded() ? config.getShortList(path) : def;
322    }
323
324    /**
325     * Gets the requested integer list by path.
326     * <p>
327     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty integer list.
328     *
329     * @param path Path of the integer list to get.
330     * @return Requested integer list.
331     */
332    @Override
333    @NotNull
334    public List<Integer> getIntegerList(@NotNull String path) {
335        return getIntegerList(path, new ArrayList<>());
336    }
337
338    /**
339     * Gets the requested integer list by path.
340     *
341     * @param path Path of the integer list to get.
342     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
343     * @return Requested integer list.
344     */
345    @Override
346    @NotNull
347    public List<Integer> getIntegerList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Integer> def) {
348        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
349        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
350        return isLoaded() ? config.getIntList(path) : def;
351    }
352
353    /**
354     * Gets the requested long list by path.
355     * <p>
356     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty long list.
357     *
358     * @param path Path of the long list to get.
359     * @return Requested long list.
360     */
361    @Override
362    @NotNull
363    public List<Long> getLongList(@NotNull String path) {
364        return getLongList(path, new ArrayList<>());
365    }
366
367    /**
368     * Gets the requested long list by path.
369     *
370     * @param path Path of the long list to get.
371     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
372     * @return Requested long list.
373     */
374    @Override
375    @NotNull
376    public List<Long> getLongList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Long> def) {
377        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
378        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
379        return isLoaded() ? config.getLongList(path) : def;
380    }
381
382    /**
383     * Gets the requested float list by path.
384     * <p>
385     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty float list.
386     *
387     * @param path Path of the float list to get.
388     * @return Requested float list.
389     */
390    @Override
391    @NotNull
392    public List<Float> getFloatList(@NotNull String path) {
393        return getFloatList(path, new ArrayList<>());
394    }
395
396    /**
397     * Gets the requested float list by path.
398     *
399     * @param path Path of the float list to get.
400     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
401     * @return Requested float list.
402     */
403    @Override
404    @NotNull
405    public List<Float> getFloatList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Float> def) {
406        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
407        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
408        return isLoaded() ? config.getFloatList(path) : def;
409    }
410
411    /**
412     * Gets the requested double list by path.
413     * <p>
414     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty double list.
415     *
416     * @param path Path of the double list to get.
417     * @return Requested double list.
418     */
419    @Override
420    @NotNull
421    public List<Double> getDoubleList(@NotNull String path) {
422        return getDoubleList(path, new ArrayList<>());
423    }
424
425    /**
426     * Gets the requested double list by path.
427     *
428     * @param path Path of the double list to get.
429     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
430     * @return Requested double list.
431     */
432    @Override
433    @NotNull
434    public List<Double> getDoubleList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Double> def) {
435        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
436        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
437        return isLoaded() ? config.getDoubleList(path) : def;
438    }
439
440    /**
441     * Gets a set containing keys in this yaml file.
442     * <p>
443     * The returned set does not include deep key.
444     *
445     * @return Set of keys contained within this yaml file.
446     */
447    @Override
448    @NotNull
449    public Collection<String> getKeys() {
450        return isLoaded() ? config.getKeys() : new LinkedHashSet<>();
451    }
452
453    /**
454     * Set the value to the specified path.
455     * <p>
456     * If given value is null, the path will be removed.
457     * If you want to save it to a file, call {@link BungeeYaml#save()}.
458     *
459     * @param path  Path of the object to set.
460     * @param value New value to set the path to.
461     */
462    @Override
463    public void set(@NotNull String path, @Nullable Object value) {
464        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
465        if (isLoaded()) config.set(path, value);
466    }
467}
